message: Fields are green, skies are blue, happy birthday to you!
The world has got only one of you, happy birthday to you!
Your dreams you should pursue, happy birthday to you!
Hope you have time to see me too, happy birthday to you!
May your heart always stand true, happy birthday to you!
Hope this year will be your debut, happy birthday to you!
Another year of your life to renew, happy birthday to you!
